definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Tian Ji races his horses (and accepts one loss in order to ensure two wins) (idiom)
the Jockey Club, Hong Kong philanthropic organization (and former gentleman's club)

sentences.english: Two jockeys were thrown in the second race.
sentences.chinese: 有两个骑师在第二场赛马时摔了下来。

sentences.english: No wonder his wife is penniless; he is always playing the horses and losing his money. (CDIP)
sentences.chinese: 难怪他妻子身无分文，他老是赌赛马，把钱都输光了。

sentences.english: Gambling is prohibited outside the enclaves of Hong Kong and Macau.
sentences.chinese: 香港和澳门赛马的外围赌马是被禁止的。

sentences.english: Unlike the rest of China, Hong Kong also has a lot of experience organizing horse races.
sentences.chinese: 不像中国其他地区，香港还有许多组织赛马的经验。

sentences.english: The owner of a race horse is always glad to see his colors get to the winning post.
sentences.chinese: 赛马的主人总是高兴看到他的标帜到达终点。

sentences.english: So the hippodrome is the circus in Latin.
sentences.chinese: 所以赛马场就是拉丁语中的马戏表演场。

sentences.english: Race around the clock at the Kings Cup Derby, for non stop racing action.
sentences.chinese: 在王者赛马会这里有永无休止的赛马竞技。

sentences.english: Race around the clock at the Kings Cup Derby, for non stop racing action.
sentences.chinese: 在王者赛马会这里有永无休止的赛马竞技。

sentences.english: In the racial horse-race, the chalkiness racer's race-horse won.
sentences.chinese: 在种族赛马运动中，老外赛手的马获胜。

sentences.english: The horse racing gathering is a great chance for guys to show off horsing skills and win a girl's heart.
sentences.chinese: 赛马会上是年轻人炫耀马技赢得姑娘芳心的绝佳场合。

sentences.english: The race horses were vaned from here to there.
sentences.chinese: 赛马被用有篷卡车从这里运送到那里。

sentences.english: then those are the 2 main horse sports that you'll see.
sentences.chinese: 你会看到这两种主要的赛马运动。

sentences.english: It was linked to horse races so it would not violate the anti-lottery laws.
sentences.chinese: 它与赛马游戏相关，所以不会违反禁止彩票法律。

sentences.english: The stewards will inspect the course to see if racing is possible.
sentences.chinese: 那些干事将检视赛马场看是否适宜比赛。

sentences.english: Who won the Ascot Gold Cup in 1904?
sentences.chinese: 谁获得了1904年爱斯科特赛马会金杯？

sentences.english: In the meantime we could watch ball games or the horse racing.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，我们还可以看球赛和赛马。

definition: the Jockey Club, Hong Kong philanthropic organization (and former gentleman's club)
to break in a horse/a trained saddle horse
Nadam or Games, Mongolian national harvest festival in July-August
